name: Space Dome
description:
Play as one of four astronauts who fight each other in the Space Dome! The dome is filled with traps that will go off more and more frequently as the match goes on.

You can push other players into traps or teleport to avoid death! Simple controls make it easy to create your complex combat strategy.

Space Dome is Fishburger Games' first title! It was as a demo to be shown at Glitch Con 2016.

We simply wanted to make something that was fun to play at conventions and succeed as we won the honorable mention award for players choice out of 22 other games.

DISCLAIMER: Requires at least two controllers to play
